p: There were 49 CVA16 cases available for phylogenetic analysis (one was excluded for analysis due to short sequences), including 1 in 2008, 45 in 2010, and 3 in 2011. All CVA16 strains detected in northern Taiwan could be classified as genotype B1a and are phylogenetically related to the CVA16 strains circulating in China ( Fig 5). All CVA16 cases detected in our study were mild infections without neurological complications.
